text: Pamela E. "Pam" Ferris (born 11 May 1948)"Little Dorrit star Pam Ferris on her 15 year rift with Catherine Zeta-Jones". Daily Mail (22 November 2008). Retrieved 18 August 2010.Pam Ferris at Directorcheck.co.uk is a British actress. She was born in Hanover to Welsh parents. She starred on television as Ma Larkin in The Darling Buds of May, and as Laura Thyme in Rosemary & Thyme. On movies, she is known for her roles as Miss Trunchbull in Matilda and as Aunt Marge in Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:British movie actors Category:British stage actors Category:British television actors Category:British voice actors Category:Welsh actors
